channel.title: How to make Herblore?
channel.description:
I'm starting with a blank source and I have nothing to refer to, so I need someone to like give me 1 whole set of code making it so the water vial and guam leaf will combine and turn into an attack potion. I will work off of what people tell more or give me, and one more question. How would I change the xp rate for each skill?
Thanks

item.title: How to make Herblore?
item.dc:creator: @jacktheblack61 jacktheblack61
item.description:
@jacktheblack61 wrote:

ok thanks… I just haven’t programmed a server for over a year now and kinda lost some basic knowledge.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make Herblore?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

This isn’t a spoon-feeding community, write an item on item though.

For xp, search “You have run out of arrows” or whatever your “out of arrows” sentence is, and when you see like fightType and stuff just change those numbers.

Read full topic
